text: Krzysztof Chamiec (2 February 1930 - 11 October 2001) was a Polish actor. He appeared in more than 45 films and television shows between 1962 and 2001. ==Selected filmography== * Panienka z okienka (1964) * The First Day of Freedom (1964) * Walkover (1965) * Zamach stanu (1981) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1930 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Polish male film actors
title: Krzysztof Chamiec
